document_info.legal_basis: Provided as a notified service under the Maharashtra Right to Public Services Act, 2015; issued by the Revenue Department under State administrative rules (Revenue Department procedures).
document_info.purpose: To certify the annual family/household income of the applicant for purposes such as reservation (EWS), housing schemes, educational scholarships/admissions, government welfare schemes, fee concessions, and loans or other official uses.
document_info.validity_period: Varies by purpose — commonly 1 year for many schemes; some usages accept up to 3 years if specifically stated. (Many departments/institutions require certificate issued within 1 year.)
document_info.processing_time_normal: 15 working days (as per Right to Public Services (RTS) listing for Income Certificate).

eligibility.age_requirement: No minimum age for family income certificate; dependent students/minors can apply through guardian — age not a formal limiting criterion.
eligibility.residence_requirement: No universal fixed years mandated in Revenue rules — domicile/residence proof of place within Maharashtra / taluka usually required. (Specific schemes may require a minimum period of residence.)
eligibility.income_limit:
Income limits depend on the scheme that uses the certificate. Common references used in Maharashtra (state / housing / EWS definitions):
- EWS: Typically up to ₹6,00,000 p.a. for major metros (Mumbai/Pune/Nagpur metro regions) and up to ₹4,50,000 p.a. in many other areas in earlier state notifications; central EWS threshold often ₹8,00,000 p.a. (use depends on scheme). 
- LIG: Limits differ by scheme; some state housing notifications set LIG up to ₹7.5–9.0 lakh p.a. (region dependent).
- MIG: Often defined up to ₹12,00,000 p.a. in recent MH guidelines for some housing schemes.
NOTE: These slabs are policy/scheme-specific (housing, PMAY, state housing policy). The Income Certificate itself states annual family income and does not by itself create EWS/LIG/MIG classification — the consuming scheme applies thresholds.
other_criteria: Family/household definition — income is generally computed as combined income of all family members (consuming authority defines family composition).
Applicant must provide documentary proof of income or a self-declaration depending on local Talathi/Tahsildar requirements.
If applicant is employed, salary slips / Form 16 / ITR may be required; if agriculturist, khasra/landholding proof or agriculturist certificate may be used.
eligibility.who_can_apply: Any resident of Maharashtra seeking an official certificate of family/household income — individuals, parents/guardians (on behalf of minors), heads of households.
exclusions: Persons unable to provide required residence or identity proof for the taluka/district in question (unless the scheme allows alternate proof).
Applicants whose income cannot be verified by the taluka/revenue authorities and who refuse to provide documentary proof may be refused until proof is produced.

required_documents.specifications: Original + self-attested copy; both sides where applicable; must match applicant details.
required_documents.notes: Used as identity and address proof where Aadhaar contains address. If Aadhaar not available, alternate government ID with address accepted as per local office.

required_documents.specifications: Original + copy; recent (within 3 months) where applicable.
required_documents.notes: Taluka office may accept local proof like Gramsevak certificate for village residents.

alternatives: Form 16 / Income Tax Returns (last assessment year)
Agricultural income proof (land records / khasra, farmer certificate)
Proof of other income (rental, business profits)
required_documents.specifications: Originals for verification + self-attested photocopies. ITR/Form 16 preferred for salaried/business applicants.
required_documents.notes: If documentary proof is not available (e.g., informal sector), a sworn affidavit / self-declaration may be accepted temporarily but revenue officer may insist on supporting evidence.

required_documents.doc_name_en: Family/Household Identity Proof (if family members included)
required_documents.specifications: Copies of family members' identity to establish household composition.
required_documents.notes: Needed when computing combined family income for EWS/LIG classification.
Form template may vary slightly by district (standardized form available on many district websites and Aaple Sarkar).

required_documents.specifications: Recent photograph (if required by local office).
required_documents.notes: Not always required for revenue-issued certificates but often asked for record.

steps.step_description_en: Create an account on Aaple Sarkar or login using existing credentials / government ID. Some districts allow guest application with limited features.
steps.step_description_marathi: Aaple Sarkar वर खाते तयार करा किंवा विद्यमान क्रेडेन्शिअल्स वापरून लॉगिन करा. काही जिल्ह्यांना मर्यादित सुविधांसह अभ्यागत अर्ज करण्याची परवानगी आहे.
steps.tips: Use a mobile number that you will keep — OTPs and status updates are sent to this number.
steps.common_errors: Using a different name/spelling than on Aadhaar; mismatched address fields.

steps.step_description_en: From Revenue department services choose 'Income Certificate (Income Certificate / मिळकतीचे प्रमाणपत्र)'.
steps.tips: Read the checklist on the portal before starting the form.
steps.common_errors: Selecting wrong certificate type (e.g., Solvency or Domicile instead).

steps.step_title_marathi: अर्ज भरा आणि कुटुंब तपशील भरा
steps.step_description_en: Enter applicant details, family composition, annual incomes of family members as required, and declare total annual family income.
steps.step_description_marathi: अर्जदार तपशील, कुटुंब रचना, कुटुंब सदस्यांचे वार्षिक उत्पन्न भरा आणि एकूण वार्षिक उत्पन्न जाहीर करा.
steps.tips: Keep ITR/Form16/bank statement figures ready to avoid mismatch.
steps.common_errors: Typographical errors in income figures; forgetting to include all family members.

steps.step_description_en: Upload identity, residence, and income proofs in permitted formats (PDF/JPG).
steps.step_description_marathi: परवान्याप्राप्त फॉरमॅटमध्ये (PDF/JPG) ओळख, निवास आणि उत्पन्न पुरावे अपलोड करा.
steps.tips: Scan pages at legible resolution; keep file sizes within portal limits.
steps.common_errors: Uploading blurred or incomplete pages; exceeding file size limits.

steps.step_title_marathi: पैसे भरणे (लागू असल्यास) आणि सबमिट करा
steps.step_description_en: Pay applicable portal/service fees (if required) via the portal payment gateway and submit the application.
steps.step_description_marathi: पोर्टलद्वारे लागू असलेली फी भरा आणि अर्ज सबमिट करा.
steps.common_errors: Payment failed but application treated as incomplete; not saving payment receipt.

steps.step_description_en: Talathi/Tahsildar or Nayab Tahsildar will verify the application and documents; field verification may be done when necessary.
steps.step_description_marathi: तालाठी/तहसीलदार किंवा ना. तहसिलदार अर्ज व कागदपत्रे तपासतील; आवश्यक असल्यास फील्ड तपासणी केली जाऊ शकते.
steps.tips: If requested for additional documents, respond quickly to avoid delays.
steps.common_errors: Ignoring requests for additional proof leading to rejection.
steps.estimated_time: Varies; up to RTS timeline (15 working days)

steps.step_description_en: On approval the certificate is signed by the authorized revenue officer and made available for download from the portal or issued physically.
steps.step_description_marathi: मान्यतेनंतर प्रमाणपत्र अधिकृत महसूल अधिकारी स्वाक्षरित करतात आणि पोर्टलवरून डाउनलोड करण्यासाठी दिले जाते किंवा प्रत्यक्ष स्वरूपात दिले जाते.
steps.tips: Download and keep multiple copies (PDF) and a printed copy for offline use.
steps.common_errors: Not checking certificate details (name, income figure) and not requesting correction in time.

application_process_online.documents_upload_format: PDF/JPG (follow portal limits); individual file size limits vary by portal (commonly 2-5 MB).
application_process_online.payment_gateway: Netbanking / Debit/Credit Card / UPI (portal dependent). Additional charges may apply at Seva Kendra counters.

application_process_offline.form_number: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE (standard district/taluka application form — many districts provide a standard income-certificate form)
application_process_offline.where_to_get_form: Taluka / Tehsil office (Tahsildar office) or district revenue office; many districts provide PDF form on district website.

steps.step_description_en: Obtain the Income Certificate application form from the Taluka/Tehsil office or download from the district website.
steps.step_description_marathi: तालुका/तहसील कार्यालयातून किंवा जिल्हा वेबसाइटवरून अर्ज फॉर्म मिळवा.
steps.tips: Verify the latest form version on the district portal.
steps.common_errors: Using an outdated form or incomplete fields.

steps.step_title_marathi: फॉर्म भरा आणि कागदपत्रे संलग्न करा
steps.step_description_en: Fill in applicant and family income details, attach identity, residence and income proofs as per checklist.
steps.step_description_marathi: अर्जदार व कुटुंबाचे उत्पन्न तपशील भरा, आणि तपासणी यादीनुसार ओळख, निवास व उत्पन्न पुरावे संलग्न करा.
steps.common_errors: Missing signatures or missing supporting documents.

steps.step_description_en: Submit form at the revenue counter; pay the prescribed fee or receive acknowledgement slip.
steps.step_description_marathi: अर्ज महसूल काउंटरवर सादर करा; निश्चित फी भरा किंवा पावती घ्या.
steps.tips: Obtain acknowledgement with application number for tracking.
steps.common_errors: Not taking acknowledgement slip or wrong payment mode.

steps.step_description_en: Office verifies documents; field verification may be carried out if needed. Collect certificate when informed or download if available.
steps.step_description_marathi: कार्यालय कागदपत्रे तपासते; आवश्यक असल्यास फील्ड तपासणी केली जाऊ शकते. सूचित केल्यावर प्रमाणपत्र घ्या किंवा उपलब्ध असल्यास डाउनलोड करा.
steps.tips: Keep the receipt number to check status.
steps.common_errors: Missing to respond to additional verification calls leading to delays.

fees_structure.exemptions: Certain welfare categories may be exempted from local service charges; check local district notice.
Full or partial exemption is often provided for SC/ST/BPL depending on district rules.
Full exemption commonly applied where BPL card is produced.

fees_structure.category: Seva Kendra Service Charge (if applying through Aaple Sarkar Seva Kendra)
fees_structure.fee_amount: Varies (example: news reports indicate ~₹69 per transaction at some gram panchayat-run Seva Kendras; this is a service/handling charge, not Govt. statutory fee)

district_variations.variations: Urban municipal areas sometimes require additional residence proof (municipal address) and may route certain services through Municipal Corporation (BMC) counters for verification.
special_requirements: Utility bills / municipal documents for address matching
district_variations.different_fees: Municipal facilitation charges may apply at civic counters.
district_variations.different_offices: BMC ward office involvement for address verification in some cases.
district_variations.notes: Metropolitan region schemes (housing) use separate EWS/LIG slabs for Mumbai metro region in some policy notifications.

district_variations.variations: Many Pune talukas provide downloadable form on district portal. Housing/EWS definitions sometimes use metro slab values for Pune city.
special_requirements: Employer certificate for salaried personnel sometimes requested
district_variations.different_offices: Tehsil office at taluka level; some Pune municipal wards facilitate verification.
district_variations.notes: Aaple Sarkar Seva Kendras available across many talukas.

district_variations.variations: Nagpur metro region occasionally uses different income slab for EWS in housing notifications (higher caps for metro).
special_requirements: Proof of family composition via ration card is commonly checked
district_variations.notes: District websites provide downloadable application formats.

district_variations.variations: Rural taluka procedures often rely on Talathi/Gramsevak verification; field enquiry may be frequent in rural pockets.
district_variations.notes: Check local taluka for specific document checklist.

district_variations.variations: Large urban + rural mix; municipal vs taluka verification varies by area.
special_requirements: Municipal property tax receipts or rent agreement for urban addresses
district_variations.different_offices: Taluka Tehsil office; some municipal facilitation centers help with submission.
district_variations.notes: Seva Kendra availability and charges vary by taluka.

offices.address: Tehsildar Office, [Exact Taluka address varies] — Citizens should refer to Municipal/Taluka website for exact building address.
Tahsildar Office, Pune District Collectorate Complex (refer district portal for exact office location)
Tahsildar Office, Nagpur District Collectorate (see district website for exact address)
Tahsildar Office, Nashik District Collectorate (see district portal for exact address)
Tahsildar Office, Thane District Collectorate (see district site for exact location)

faqs.question_en: Can I apply from a different district?
faqs.question_marathi: मी दुसऱ्या जिल्ह्यातून अर्ज करू शकतो का?
faqs.answer_en: Generally you should apply at the Taluka/Tehsil where you are a resident (address on Aadhaar/ration card). Some districts allow application at the place of current residence with supporting proof, but the issuing authority is typically the local Tahsildar.
faqs.answer_marathi: सामान्यतः आपण आपल्या रहिवासी तालुका/तहसील येथे अर्ज करावा (आधार/रशन कार्डवरील पत्ता). काही प्रकरणांमध्ये सध्याच्या रहिवासी ठिकाणाहून पुराव्यांसह अर्ज करता येऊ शकतो, परंतु प्रमाणपत्र स्थानिक तहसीलदाराकडूनच दिले जाते.

faqs.question_en: How long is an income certificate valid?
faqs.question_marathi: उत्पन्न प्रमाणपत्र किती काळासाठी वैध असते?
faqs.answer_en: Validity depends on the purpose and consuming department — many institutions accept certificates issued within the last 1 year; some schemes may accept up to 3 years. Confirm with the agency requiring the certificate.
faqs.answer_marathi: वैधता वापरावर आणि संबंधित खात्यावर अवलंबून असते — अनेक संस्था मागील 1 वर्षात जारी केलेले प्रमाणपत्र स्वीकारतात; काही योजनांमध्ये 3 वर्षे लागू होऊ शकतात. प्रमाणपत्राची आवश्यकता असलेल्या संस्थेशी पुष्टी करा.

faqs.question_en: What if I don't have formal income documents?
faqs.question_marathi: माझ्याकडे औपचारिक उत्पन्न दस्तऐवज नसतील तर काय?
faqs.answer_en: Revenue officers may accept a sworn affidavit/self-declaration and may carry out field verification (Talathi/Gramsevak). However for many schemes ITR/Form16 or bank statements are preferred.
faqs.answer_marathi: महसूल अधिकाऱ्यांनी शपथपत्र/स्व-घोषणा स्वीकारू शकते आणि फील्ड तपासणी केली जाऊ शकते. परंतु अनेक योजना यासाठी ITR/Form16/बँक स्टेटमेंटला प्राधान्य देतात.

faqs.question_en: Can the certificate be downloaded online?
faqs.question_marathi: प्रमाणपत्र ऑनलाईन डाउनलोड करता येईल का?
faqs.answer_en: Yes — if the district has enabled e-issuance via Aaple Sarkar. Otherwise, applicants receive an acknowledgement and collect from the taluka office.
faqs.answer_marathi: होय — जर जिल्ह्याने Aaple Sarkar द्वारे ई-इश्यूअन सक्षम केले असेल तर. अन्यथा, अर्जदारांना पावती मिळते आणि ते तहसील कार्यालयातून प्रमाणपत्र घेऊ शकतात.

faqs.answer_en: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE — the RTS Act provides fixed timelines (15 days). Some districts may offer faster processing in exceptional cases; check local office.
faqs.answer_marathi: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE — RTS कायदा 15 दिवसांची निश्चित मुदत देतो. काही जिल्हे अपवादात्मक प्रकरणांत वेगवान प्रक्रिया देऊ शकतात; स्थानिक कार्यालयाशी तपासा.

faqs.question_en: Does Income Certificate automatically qualify me for EWS?
faqs.question_marathi: उत्पन्न प्रमाणपत्र मला आपोआप EWS साठी पात्र बनवते का?
faqs.answer_en: No — the Income Certificate only states family income. Whether that income satisfies EWS/LIG/MIG thresholds is determined by the consuming scheme or department which applies its own thresholds.
faqs.answer_marathi: नाही — उत्पन्न प्रमाणपत्र फक्त कुटुंबाचे उत्पन्न दाखवते. EWS/LIG/MIG निकष पूर्ण होतात का हे ती योजना/विभाग ठरवते.

faqs.question_en: What is the Right To Public Services timeline for Income Certificate?
faqs.question_marathi: उत्पन्न प्रमाणपत्रासाठी सार्वजनिक सेवा हक्क (RTS) कालावधी किती आहे?
faqs.answer_en: 15 working days (Income Certificate is a listed Revenue service under Maharashtra RTS Act with 15 days timeline).
faqs.answer_marathi: 15 कार्यदिवस (उत्पन्न प्रमाणपत्र महसूल सेवांमध्ये RTS अंतर्गत 15 दिवसात दिले जाण्याचे नोंदिलेले आहे).

faqs.question_en: Can students outside Maharashtra use this certificate?
faqs.question_marathi: महत्त्वाचे: महाराष्ट्राबाहेरील विद्यार्थी हे प्रमाणपत्र वापरू शकतात का?
faqs.answer_en: No — the Maharashtra income certificate is issued to state residents and many state schemes/scholarships require Maharashtra domicile; out-of-state applicants should obtain certificate from their home state.
faqs.answer_marathi: नाही — महाराष्ट्र उत्पन्न प्रमाणपत्र राज्यातील रहिवाशांसाठी जारी होते व अनेक योजना/शिष्यवृत्तीसाठी राज्यीय अधिवास आवश्यक असतो; बाहेरच्या राज्यातील अर्जदारांनी स्वतःच्या राज्यातून प्रमाणपत्र घ्यावे.

faqs.answer_en: Authorized revenue officer — typically Nayab Tahsildar / Tahsildar (depending on delegation in that taluka).
faqs.answer_marathi: अधिकृत महसूल अधिकारी — सहसा ना. तहसिलदार / तहसिलदार (तालुका प्रमाणे अधिकार देण्यात आलेले असते).

common_issues.issue_description_en: Application rejected due to incorrect income proof
common_issues.solution_en: Resubmit with correct documentary evidence (ITR/Form16/salary slips/bank statements). If informal income, provide a sworn affidavit and request field verification.
common_issues.solution_marathi: योग्य कागदपत्र (ITR/Form16/पगार पर्च्या/बँक स्टेटमेंट) सह पुन्हा सादर करा. अनौपचारिक उत्पन्न असल्यास शपथपत्र द्या आणि फील्ड तपासणीची विनंती करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Check the accepted list of income proofs on the district checklist before submission.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Delay because of incomplete family composition details
common_issues.solution_en: Provide complete family member list with supporting ID documents (ration card/Aadhaar).
common_issues.solution_marathi: रशन कार्ड/आधार यांसारख्या समर्थन ID सह पूर्ण कुटुंब यादी द्या.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Prepare family identity proofs (ration card, Aadhaar copies) beforehand.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Mismatch between declared income and ITR/Form16 numbers
common_issues.issue_description_marathi: घोषित उत्पन्न व ITR/Form16 मधील आकडे जुळत नाहीत
common_issues.solution_en: Clarify and correct figures; attach ITR/Form16/bank statements to reconcile differences.
common_issues.solution_marathi: आकडे स्पष्ट करा व दुरुस्त करा; फरक मिटवण्यासाठी ITR/Form16/बँक स्टेटमेंट संलग्न करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Use exact figures from official documents when filling amounts.

common_issues.solution_en: Cooperate with the field officer, provide requested documents promptly, and request a tentative timeline from the office.
common_issues.solution_marathi: फील्ड अधिकाऱ्याशी सहकार्य करा, लवकरात लवकर आवश्यक कागदपत्रे द्या आणि कार्यालयाकडून अंदाजे कालावधी मागवा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Provide full and clear proof at submission to reduce need for field checks.

common_issues.solution_en: Visit the submission counter with identity proof and request status using applicant details; if applied online, use application number to track.
common_issues.solution_marathi: सादर केलेल्या काउंटरवर ओळखपत्र घेऊन जा आणि अर्ज तपासण्यासाठी विनंती करा; ऑनलाईन अर्ज असल्यास अर्ज क्रमांक वापरून ट्रॅक करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Always take acknowledgement receipt and note application number.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Portal rejects uploads due to file size/type
common_issues.issue_description_marathi: फाइल आकार / प्रकारामुळे पोर्टलने अपलोड नाकारले
common_issues.solution_en: Compress or convert documents to accepted formats (PDF/JPG) and re-upload. Follow portal file-size limits.
common_issues.solution_marathi: फाइल संकुचित करा किंवा स्वीकारलेल्या फॉरमॅटमध्ये रूपांतर करा (PDF/JPG) आणि पुन्हा अपलोड करा. पोर्टलच्या मर्यादा पाळा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Scan documents at recommended DPI and check portal help for size limits.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Discrepancy in name spelling between documents
common_issues.solution_en: Provide affidavit or supporting ID that connects the name variants (e.g., marriage certificate). Request correction before certificate issuance.
common_issues.solution_marathi: नावाच्या बदलांसाठी शपथपत्र किंवा समर्थन ID द्या (उदा. विवाह प्रमाणपत्र). प्रमाणपत्र जारी होण्यापूर्वी दुरुस्तीसाठी विनंती करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Use consistent name spellings across all documents or provide a linking affidavit.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Seva Kendra charges higher facilitation fee
common_issues.issue_description_marathi: सेवा केंद्राची अधिक सुविधा शुल्क आकारणी
common_issues.solution_en: Check official Aaple Sarkar portal for statutory fee and ask for itemised receipt from the Kendra. Seva Kendra may charge extra handling fee which should be disclosed.
common_issues.solution_marathi: कायदेशीर फी साठी Aaple Sarkar पोर्टल तपासा आणि केंद्राकडून तपशीलवार पावती मागवा. सेवा केंद्र अतिरिक्त हाताळणी शुल्क आकारू शकते जे जाहीर केलेले असावे.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Apply online yourself where possible to avoid third-party facilitation charges.

common_issues.solution_en: Approach the issuing Tahsildar office with the acknowledgement and request rectification; there is an appellate mechanism under RTS for grievances.
common_issues.solution_marathi: पावती घेऊन तहसीलदार कार्यालयाशी संपर्क करा आणि दुरुस्तीची विनंती करा; RTS अंतर्गत तक्रार निवारणाचा मार्ग आहे.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Carefully check all fields before final submission and immediately request correction if found.

tracking_information.tracking_url: https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en (use Application Status/Track service on portal or district e-services status pages)
tracking_information.estimated_response_time: 15 working days (as per RTS listing; actual may be shorter depending on district)

grievance_redressal.complaint_portal: https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en (Right To Service / grievance mechanism available through district portals and Aaple Sarkar contact forms)
grievance_redressal.complaint_helpline: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE (district collector office helpline numbers are published on respective district portals)
grievance_redressal.complaint_email: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE (use district collector/revenue office email from district website)
grievance_redressal.escalation_process: 1) Contact the issuing Tahsildar/Nayab Tahsildar; 2) If unresolved, file First Appeal to designated First Appellate Officer (as per RTS details); 3) If unresolved, file Second Appeal as per district/RTS mechanism and then approach Collector or designated authority. RTS prescribes officers & timelines.
grievance_redressal.ombudsman_details: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE (use district collectorate / state-level grievance portals)

additional_notes.recent_changes: Income slabs for housing/EWS/LIG/MIG have been revised in recent years for specific schemes — e.g., state notifications changed metro vs rest-of-state slabs for some housing schemes. Always confirm scheme-specific income thresholds (EWS/LIG/MIG) from the scheme circular/GR rather than from the Income Certificate alone.
additional_notes.seasonal_variations: Rush periods: academic admission seasons (May–Aug), housing scheme application windows, and scholarship timelines — expect longer processing times during these periods.
additional_notes.special_provisions: Senior citizens, persons with disabilities, and BPL/SC/ST applicants often receive concessions or fee exemptions — check district circulars for special facilitation.
related_documents: Caste Certificate (if applying for caste-based reservation)
BPL Certificate / Ration Card (for schemes targeting BPL)
useful_links: Aaple Sarkar Income Certificate service listing / portal (use for applying online)
District revenue office forms (example: Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar district income certificate form)
Maharashtra Right to Public Services Act, 2015 listings for Revenue services
